description: X-CIRCLE-X is a decentralized financial solidarity platform reinventing traditional tontines (ROSCA) on MultiversX blockchain. At its core lies the Circle of Life: an innovative ecosystem of interconnected smart contracts where tokens flow daily in a circular pattern. Features include 12-level staking (up to 42% APY), evolutionary NFTs representing on-chain reputation, and DAO governance. Total supply equals Pi x 10^8 (314,159,265 XCIRCLEX) - the mathematical soul of the perfect circle.
